Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory683.jpg'}
{3: 'Outside the theater, a female Construct arrives as promised.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: 'Since you called me here, I reckon you remember what day it is today.', 4: '1'}
{3: "It's hard to tell from Qu's tone and posture whether she's satisfied or not."}
{2: 'Got two tickets.', 3: '9'}
{2: "Figured it'd be nice to catch it together.", 3: '10'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory684.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory684.jpg'}
{3: 'Walking toward the theater, the crowd buzzes, with many formally dressed folks, clearly more than your average civilians.'}
{2: 'Seems like the performance is a play passed down through Kowloong.', 3: '16'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: 'Ah, it\'s "The Love of the Cowherd and Weaver Girl".', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Hmm, this magpie bridge looks pretty well done.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Qu somehow gets her hands on a program, which shows photos of the magpie bridge made with projections and steel structures.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'So the production team went all out.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Flipping through the program, her curiosity is plain to see.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'They even added lighting and projection technology... while traditional opera performances would only include a few Constructs for minor roles at most.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "It's safe to say they went above and beyond.", 4: '1'}
{2: "It's evident they've put in serious effort.", 3: '29', 4: "They've put in serious effort.", 5: '29'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "The art of Kowloong Opera has been on the brink of extinction for ages. Sometimes I wonder if it's already gone.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'There used to be troupes invited to perform in the city, but then, other forms of entertainment completely took over.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Qu calmly recounts the incident.'}
{2: 'Did you used to listen to opera often?', 3: '34'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "Honestly, I've only heard it a few times.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'I struggled to appreciate its beauty at first. By the time I started to understand, there were hardly any places left to hear it.', 4: '1'}
{3: "She sounds like she is discussing someone else's affairs, yet she is far from indifferent."}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory540.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory540.jpg'}
{3: 'As you talk, you make your way inside the theater. To avoid attracting too much attention, you pick seats toward the back with a good view.'}
{2: 'Does it bring back any familiar feelings?', 3: '43'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: 'A bit, especially this curtain...', 4: '1'}
{3: "Qu's tone takes on a playful note as she eyes the thick, vibrant curtain."}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Honestly, neither the venue nor the stage design resembles traditional opera artistry.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'The exquisite setting and stage art lose that subtle charm.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "I can't see any serious study into this nearly-extinct art...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She shakes her head.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "It seems like it's just trying to hold onto and show off what it once had. Wishful thinking, perhaps.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "Such changes seem a bit self-centered; it's hard for me to pass judgment.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'After all, nothing can beat memories.', 3: '55'}
{2: "So, you're not exactly thrilled about it?", 3: '56'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "No, everyone's memories are unique.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Memories vary across time periods, identities, and places; no two people will recall the same event exactly the same way.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "Whether it's about glorifying or altering, what endures is more important. They morph into their own stories.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "You're paying attention to the performance, right?", 4: '1'}
{3: "Her expression says she's not exactly thrilled."}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "So, I'm not against giving old things a fresh spin.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "And that thing you've been keeping in your pocket—it's time to take it out, right?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'You cannot hide it from her, indeed.'}
{3: 'Taking out a box from your pocket, you open it up and reveal a Kowloong wooden comb.'}
{3: 'She pauses as she sees the peacock engraved on the comb.'}
{2: 'Took a while to put this together.', 3: '69'}
{2: 'Think of it as wishful thinking on my part? A gift for a "partner."', 3: '70'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "I was just about to mention, such material isn't exactly hard to come by.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Qu's hand grazes the peacock feathers on the wooden comb, her fingers intertwining with your own."}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Thanks. How about giving my hair a quick brush right here?', 4: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory549.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory549.jpg'}
{3: 'With that, you pick up the comb and begin gently gathering her locks. The ambient light gradually dims, directing all attention to the center stage.'}
{3: '"Twas on the seventh day of the seventh month, beneath the Milky Way..."'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The aria commences, and she fixes her gaze on the stage, entrusting her back and flowing hair to you.'}
{3: '"Where the Cowherd and the Weaver Girl meet in the heavens—"'}
{3: 'Without warning, Qu leans into you.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Your touch is as tender as ever.', 4: '1'}
